channel.title: Monte del Gallo || Web development agency
channel.description: Recent content on Monte del Gallo || Web development agency

item.title: Beego - a Golang Framework to Build Web Applications
item.description: Go is a blazing fast programming language and we, here at MonteDelGallo, love it. So I want to share with you this “new” framework for building web applications with Go. Its name is Beego Introduction to Beego If you are a web developer you are probably very familiar with frameworks either you use PHP, Ruby, Python, or Node. But what if you, like me, felt in love with Go and want to use it to develop your next web application?

item.title: Filters Results in Ruby on Rails Views
Why We Exist
item.description: Hugo uses the excellent go html/template library for its template engine. It is an extremely lightweight engine that provides a very small amount of logic. In our experience that it is just the right amount of logic to be able to create a good static website. If you have used other template systems from different languages or frameworks you will find a lot of similarities in go templates.

item.title: Go is for lovers
item.description: Hugo uses the excellent go html/template library for its template engine. It is an extremely lightweight engine that provides a very small amount of logic. In our experience that it is just the right amount of logic to be able to create a good static website. If you have used other template systems from different languages or frameworks you will find a lot of similarities in go templates. This document is a brief primer on using go templates.

item.title: Contact
item.description: We are one step away from each other Do you have a great idea, but you are not quite sure it’s doable? Would you like to explore a possible opportunity with us? Or just give us a feedback on something? Leave us a message, and we will get back to you as soon as we can.
